alert.note: Alert for Duval; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Duval and southeastern Webb Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 818 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aguilares, or 23 miles west of Hebbronville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oilton, Mirando City, Aguilares and Bruni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
